words.definition: to be touching it or opposed to it
words.example: They both leaned against the wall.

words.definition: a sandy or rocky place by the ocean
words.example: The little girl built a sandcastle on the beach.

words.definition: to break something
words.example: The car was damaged in the accident.

words.definition: to find something for the first time
words.example: I discovered some new information in this book!

words.definition: how you feel
words.example: Anger is a common emotion that many people feel.

words.definition: to make something work again
words.example: My dad has to fix my bike for me.

words.definition: being honest
words.example: The teacher had a frank discussion with her students.

words.definition: to be able to name someone or something
words.example: I used the chart to identify the name of the star.

words.definition: land of any size that is surrounded by water
words.example: Japan is a group of islands.

words.definition: the body of salt water that covers most of the Earth
words.example: The ocean can get very rough at night.

words.definition: maybe
words.example: Perhaps I will eat an apple for lunch.

words.definition: enjoyable and make you feel happy
words.example: The wedding was a pleasant experience for everyone.

words.definition: to stop something from happening
words.example: The cold weather prevented us from going for a walk.

words.definition: a hard thing in the ground
words.example: I stacked rocks on top of one another.

words.definition: to keep someone or something from being hurt
words.example: I want to help save the world.

words.definition: to walk by putting one foot in front of the other
words.example: Be careful where you step.

words.definition: used when you say that a situation keeps on going
words.example: They are still waiting in line to get tickets.

words.definition: the flavor something has in your mouth
words.example: The ice cream tastes like strawberries.

words.definition: to use your hand to make something go through the air
words.example: The pitcher can throw the baseball very fast.

words.definition: a line of water that moves across the surface of the ocean
words.example: The water was filled with huge waves.
